description: Defines how a field in the dataset participates (or does not participate) in a popup window.
title: fieldInfo

$eref.description: The format object can be used with numerical or date fields to provide more detail about how values should be displayed in popup windows.
$eref.title: format

___digitSeparator.description: A Boolean used with numerical fields. A value of true allows the number to have a digit (or thousands) separator when the value appears in popup windows. Depending on the locale, this separator is a decimal point or a comma. A value of false means that no separator will be used.

___places.description: An integer used with numerical fields to specify the number of supported decimal places that should appear in popup windows. Any places beyond this value are rounded.

___dateFormat.description: A string used with date fields to specify how the date should appear in popup windows.

___format.description: A format object used with numerical or date fields to provide more detail about how the value should be displayed in a popup window.

___fieldName.description: A string containing the field name as defined by the service. Anywhere that a fieldname is referenced as `{field-name} in popupInfo, an Arcade expression can also be referenced as `{expression/<expression-name>}`.

___stringFieldOption.description: A string determining what type of input box editors see when editing the field. Applies only to string fields. Not applicable to Arcade expressions.

___visible.description: A Boolean determining whether the field is visible in the popup window.

___tooltip.description: A string providing an editing hint for editors of the field. Not applicable to Arcade expressions.

___isEditable.description: A Boolean determining whether users can edit this field. Not applicable to Arcade expressions.

___label.description: A string containing the field alias. Not applicable to Arcade expressions as `title` is used instead.
